name: Natural Grace
description: Energized with floral soaring might, this Pokemon's agility in the air is second to none. On cold and dark nights it may undergo a transformation.
effect: Add 2 Extra Chance Dice to all effects done by this Pokemon. (e.g. A move has 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe, will roll 5 Dice with this Pokemon). While the User has an increase to their Evasion they cannot lose their Flying-Type immunities through Weather or Move effects. While undergoing a Stat Reset the character may choose to change forms.
